Frontend was calling non-existent enable_copy_trade, causing FunctionNotFound.
Now calls add_copy_relation with correct args: registry, trader, follower,
copy_ratio, max_position_size.
EOF
\)")

fix: align frontend with on-chain contract for testnet position opening

- Parse margin as Balance<T> nested struct \(fields.value\)
- Derive position status from is_closed bool instead of missing status field
- Cap leverage at 20x to match Move contract enforcement
- Update leverage indicator thresholds and labels
- Add usePositions hook for on-chain position querying
- Wire up vault auto-creation + USDC deposit in PTB flow
EOF
\)")
